Class SpringContext

java.lang.Object
autoberlo.autoberlo.service.SpringContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
@Component public class SpringContext extends Object implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
Utility class to access Spring-managed beans from non-Spring managed classes. This class implements ApplicationContextAware to capture the ApplicationContext at runtime and provides a static method getBean() to retrieve beans programmatically. Useful in cases where dependency injection is not directly possible (e.g., inside static contexts).
Author:
Mandrusz Zsolt, Németh Marcell, Szász Kristóf

    • getBean

      public static <T> T getBean(Class<T> beanClass)
      Returns a Spring-managed bean of the given class type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the bean
      Parameters:
      beanClass - the class of the bean to retrieve
      Returns:
      an instance of the requested bean

    • setApplicationContext

      public void setApplicationContext(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context) throws org.springframework.beans.BeansException
      Sets the ApplicationContext when the application starts. This method is called automatically by Spring.
      Specified by:
      setApplicationContext in interface org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
      Parameters:
      context - the application context to set
      Throws:
      org.springframework.beans.BeansException - if context setting fails
